caption.p: Anti-inflammatory mechanism of Tualang, Gelam and Kelulut honeys. TNF-α: tumor necrosis factor alpha; COX-2: cyclooxygenase-2; TNF- α: tumour necrosis factor alpha; IL-1β: interleukin-1 beta; IL-10: interleukin 10; NF-kB: nuclear factor kappa B; IκBα: NF-kappa-B inhibitor alpha; MAPK: mitogen-activated protein kinases; Nrf2: nuclear factor erythroid 2–related factor 2.
